sentences.en: A number of unruly youth ganged up and terrorized the district.
sentences.cn: 一些不法青年结成一伙,使这个地区充满恐怖.

sentences.en: A number of unruly youths ganged up and terrorized the district.
sentences.cn: 一些不法青年结成一伙,使这个地区陷于恐怖.

sentences.en: An unruly mob broke down police barricades and stormed the courtroom.
sentences.cn: 一伙暴徒捣毁了警察设置的路障冲进法庭。

sentences.en: He was unruly in class and made an enemy of most of his teachers.
sentences.cn: 他因上课调皮捣蛋而成为大多数老师的眼中钉。

sentences.en: It's not good enough just to blame the unruly children.
sentences.cn: 对难管教的孩子只是责备是不够的。

sentences.en: Schools are booting out record numbers of unruly pupils.
sentences.cn: 学校开除了数量空前的难以管教的小学生。

sentences.en: She eyed his unruly collar-length hair with disfavour.
sentences.cn: 她反感地盯着他那长及衣领的一头乱发。

sentences.en: She patted down unruly wisps of hair.
sentences.cn: 她用手把翘起的头发轻轻拍平.

sentences.en: Teddy ran thick fingers through his unruly thatch of hair.
sentences.cn: 泰迪用自己的粗手指头捋了一下浓密蓬乱的头发。

sentences.en: The children were quite unruly and ran around the house as if they owned it.
sentences.cn: 孩子们很不守规矩,在房子里跑来跑去,像是在自己家一样.

sentences.en: The class's unruly behaviour shamed the teacher.
sentences.cn: 这班学生不守规矩的行为使老师感到羞愧.

sentences.en: The man had a huge head of remarkably black, unruly hair.
sentences.cn: 那个人有一头乱蓬蓬的黑发。

sentences.en: The only way to curb this unruly mob is to use tear gas.
sentences.cn: 压制这群暴徒的惟一方法是使用催泪瓦斯.

sentences.en: The severe punishment was meted out to the unruly hooligan.
sentences.cn: 对那个嚣张的流氓已给予严厉惩处.

sentences.en: You get a lot of unruly drunks fighting each other.
sentences.cn: 有很多无法无天的醉鬼在相互斗殴。

trans.tran_cn: 不守规矩的，任性的，难驾驭的，难控制的
